description: The table COD_CONTACT_INFO contains information about coding records (records in the COD master file). A row in this table contains information about each individual contact for coding records. Coding records store information from Clinical Documentation Improvement (CDI) reviews. A single coding record is created for the hospital account, with each contact (or row) containing information from a separate CDI review of the account.

columns.name: CODING_RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the coding record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CONTACT_SERIAL_NUM
columns.description: The contact serial number (CSN) of the contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_NUM
columns.description: The contact number of the contact.

columns.name: CNCT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The contact type of the contact.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Record Creation


CDI Working Review


CDI Baseline Review


CDI Possible Review

columns.name: CDI_USER_ID
columns.description: The user ID of the clinical documentation improvement (CDI) specialist who performed the CDI review.

columns.name: CDI_NEXT_REVIEW_DT
columns.description: The next review date for a clinical documentation improvement (CDI) review.

columns.name: CDI_PX_CODE_SET_C_NAME
columns.description:
The procedure code set in a clinical documentation improvement (CDI) review.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


ICD-9-CM Volume 3


ICD-10-PCS


OPCS-4


A&E Investigation/Treatment

columns.name: CDI_DX_CODE_SET_C_NAME
columns.description:
The diagnosis code set in a clinical documentation improvement (CDI) review.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


ICD-9-CM


ICD-10-CM


ICD-10-CA


ICD-10-UK


DBC


ICD-10 Dutch


ICD-10-AM


A&E Diagnoses


SKS


ICD-10-THL


ICPC-2


ICD-O-3


ICD-10-GM


ICD-9-CM Supplemental


ICD-10-BE


ICD-10-NO

columns.name: CONTACT_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the current status of a contact on the coding record.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Active


Restored


Combined


Deleted

columns.name: CDI_REVIEW_LOC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time that a clinical documentation improvement (CDI) review took place, relative to the timezone of the location in which the review took place.

columns.name: LINKED_QUERY_ID
columns.description: This column is reserved for future development.

columns.name: SOURCE_CSN_ID
columns.description: This item contains the contact serial number from the source coding record associated with this coding contact. This item is set when a coding contact is merged from another coding record.
